Basic:
import { Index } from 'solid-js'
import { TagsInput } from '@ark-ui/solid'

export const Basic = () => (
  <TagsInput.Root>
    <TagsInput.Context>
      {(api) => (
        <>
          <TagsInput.Label>Frameworks</TagsInput.Label>
          <TagsInput.Control>
            <Index each={api().value}>
              {(value, index) => (
                <TagsInput.Item index={index} value={value()}>
                  <TagsInput.ItemPreview>
                    <TagsInput.ItemText>{value()}</TagsInput.ItemText>
                    <TagsInput.ItemDeleteTrigger>Delete</TagsInput.ItemDeleteTrigger>
                  </TagsInput.ItemPreview>
                  <TagsInput.ItemInput />
                </TagsInput.Item>
              )}
            </Index>
            <TagsInput.Input placeholder="Add Framework" />
            <TagsInput.ClearTrigger>Clear All</TagsInput.ClearTrigger>
          </TagsInput.Control>
        </>
      )}
    </TagsInput.Context>
  </TagsInput.Root>
)
InitialValue:
import { Index } from 'solid-js'
import { TagsInput } from '@ark-ui/solid'

export const InitialValue = () => {
  return (
    <TagsInput.Root value={['React', 'Solid', 'Vue']}>
      <TagsInput.Context>
        {(api) => (
          <>
            <TagsInput.Label>Frameworks</TagsInput.Label>
            <TagsInput.Control>
              <Index each={api().value}>
                {(value, index) => (
                  <TagsInput.Item index={index} value={value()}>
                    <TagsInput.ItemText>{value()}</TagsInput.ItemText>
                    <TagsInput.ItemInput />
                    <TagsInput.ItemDeleteTrigger>Delete</TagsInput.ItemDeleteTrigger>
                  </TagsInput.Item>
                )}
              </Index>
            </TagsInput.Control>
            <TagsInput.Input placeholder="Add tag" />
            <TagsInput.ClearTrigger>Clear all</TagsInput.ClearTrigger>
          </>
        )}
      </TagsInput.Context>
    </TagsInput.Root>
  )
}
MaxWithOverflow:
import { Index } from 'solid-js'
import { TagsInput } from '@ark-ui/solid'

export const MaxWithOverflow = () => {
  return (
    <TagsInput.Root max={3} allowOverflow>
      <TagsInput.Context>
        {(api) => (
          <>
            <TagsInput.Label>Frameworks</TagsInput.Label>
            <TagsInput.Control>
              <Index each={api().value}>
                {(value, index) => (
                  <TagsInput.Item index={index} value={value()}>
                    <TagsInput.ItemText>{value()}</TagsInput.ItemText>
                    <TagsInput.ItemInput />
                    <TagsInput.ItemDeleteTrigger>Delete</TagsInput.ItemDeleteTrigger>
                  </TagsInput.Item>
                )}
              </Index>
            </TagsInput.Control>
            <TagsInput.Input placeholder="Add Framework" />
            <TagsInput.ClearTrigger>Clear all</TagsInput.ClearTrigger>
          </>

      </TagsInput.Context>

  )
}

PasteBehavior:
import { Index } from 'solid-js'
import { TagsInput } from '@ark-ui/solid'

export const PasteBehavior = () => {
  return (
    <TagsInput.Root addOnPaste delimiter=",">
      <TagsInput.Context>
        {(api) => (
          <>
            <TagsInput.Label>Frameworks</TagsInput.Label>
            <TagsInput.Control>
              <Index each={api().value}>
                {(value, index) => (
                  <TagsInput.Item index={index} value={value()}>
                    <TagsInput.ItemText>{value()}</TagsInput.ItemText>

DisabledEditing:
import { Index } from 'solid-js'
import { TagsInput } from '@ark-ui/solid'

export const DisabledEditing = () => {
  return (
    <TagsInput.Root allowEditTag={false}>
      <TagsInput.Context>
        {(api) => (
          <>
            <TagsInput.Label>Frameworks</TagsInput.Label>
            <TagsInput.Control>
              <Index each={api().value}>
                {(value, index) => (
                  <TagsInput.Item index={index} value={value()}>
                    <TagsInput.ItemText>{value()}</TagsInput.ItemText>
                    <TagsInput.ItemInput />
                    <TagsInput.ItemDeleteTrigger>Delete</TagsInput.ItemDeleteTrigger>
                  </TagsInput.Item>
                )}
              </Index>
            </TagsInput.Control>
            <TagsInput.Input placeholder="Add Framework" />
            <TagsInput.ClearTrigger>Clear all</TagsInput.ClearTrigger>
          </>
        )}
      </TagsInput.Context>
    </TagsInput.Root>
  )
}
